name: Super Sonic Boy - S.P.E.E.D.
description: Super Sonic Boy - Speed Power Escapade Extravaganza Dimension is a simple platformer game made for a 49 hour game jam with the theme "inconvenient superpowers". You play as Super Sonic Boy, a boy with power of super speed, but there are two problems: he can't turn it off and the more hurt he gets the faster he becomes! You'll have to collect the Disorder Diamond in each level to open the Telering portal and proceed to the next one.
